bill_title: Honoring Allyson Friez, South Dakota's Junior Miss.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Allyson Friez, South Dakota's Junior Miss. WHEREAS, Allyson Friez served as a first-term Senate Page during the Seventy-third Legislative Session and was selected by her peers to return for the thirty-fourth legislative day; and WHEREAS, Allyson Friez has been elected by the student body of Riggs High School in Pierre to serve as the Vice President of the Student Senate; and WHEREAS, Allyson Friez has been selected to represent South Dakota in the National Junior Miss Contest in Mobile, Alabama: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-third Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Allyson Friez be honored for her accomplishments and be extended best wishes as she represents the state at the National Junior Miss Contest.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Allyson Friez, South Dakota's Junior Miss. WHEREAS, Allyson Friez served as a first-term Senate Page during the Seventy-third Legislative Session and was selected by her peers to return for the thirty-fourth legislative day; and WHEREAS, Allyson Friez has been elected by the student body of Riggs High School in Pierre to serve as the Vice President of the Student Senate; and WHEREAS, Allyson Friez has been selected to represent South Dakota in the National Junior Miss Contest in Mobile, Alabama: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-third Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Allyson Friez be honored for her accomplishments and be extended best wishes as she represents the state at the National Junior Miss Contest.
